message: Let's be fair, Bob. I propose a 60/40 split.
I think 60/40 is too skewed. How about 55/45?
Bob, the value is decreasing.  I'll meet you in the middle - 55/45.
Since my gain doesn't lose value, I'll take a bit more. 57/43?
Bob, this is getting ridiculous. Take 48 before it shrinks even further!
I'll take advantage of the inflation. 60/40 is my new offer.
